query_1.text: How did Taylor Swift's transition from country to pop music influence her commercial success and critical acclaim in the music industry?

query_2.text: In what ways has Ed Sheeran's songwriting and collaboration with other artists contributed to his status as one of the best-selling music artists of all time?

query_3.text: How has Adele Laurie Blue Adkins's vocal ability and emotional storytelling in her music impacted her award-winning career and connection with audiences?

query_4.text: In what ways has Beyoncé Knowles Carter's activism and representation of Black culture through her music and performances affected her influence as an artist and public figure?

query_5.text: How did Bruno Mars's diverse musical style and innovative performances contribute to his multiple Grammy Award wins and global popularity?

query_6.text: In what ways has Lady Gaga's advocacy for mental health awareness and LGBTQ+ rights influenced her artistic expression and the reception of her work?
